# Psychic Turmoil, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 40-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Expanded Psionics Handbook (WotC), pg. 221

As *[[Psychic Turmoil (Spell)|psychic turmoil]]**,* except you gain 1 temporary hit point for each power point the spell takes from a psionic creature. The temporary hit points last for 1 hour.
